title: "Please wait 24 hours before trying again"
body: This is rather annoying, it has been more than 2 days yet I am still restricted from purchasing RP. Why won't this restriction lift? Is there some sort of a bug or something? I can't be the only one

replies.body:
This message pops up as a security precaution if you've attempted too many transactions in the store in a short period of time. You'll need to wait 24+ hours before your next **attempt** at making a purchase in the store with this payment method. Any attempts before the 24 hours will reset the timer and you'll then have to wait another 24 hours.

Let me know if you have any further questions with this.

Hey RemarkableIdo,

I recommend contacting Player Support regarding this issue: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Here's more information regarding your error: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753204-Credit-Card#h4q5
